entry.title: About me
entry.summary: Hi there, I'm Edward. I work as a Senior Designer in IT Services, providing support for design to user-focused website…
entry.content:
Hi there, I'm Edward. I work as a Senior Designer in IT Services, providing support for design to user-focused website projects across the University.

I love all things web and tech, and I'm always consuming new information in that space. When I'm not working or spending time with my family (husband/dad here), I enjoy coffee, food and positive enthusiasm!

I also try to manage my brain plasticity through mindfulness and exercise - it's been great for me so far!

One thing I'm not keen on is sand - it gets everywhere!
